reviewText:
If you are interested in what was the Soviet Union as are many of us that grew-up during the Cold War, this film will give you an inside look at life in Moscow in 1984.

Of course it is a science fiction series and it reminds me a bit of Dr. Who at least with respect to its special effects.

Interestingly the girl " Alice " is today a biochemist.

It's easy to understand why this movie became a cult classic among Soviet school children. It kept me interested in what was coming next. Great actors, great writing, and the song Prekrasnoe Daluko make it  worth while. Subtitled
Guest from the Future / Gostya iz buduschego A wonderful film imaginative entertainment and good for the entire family to watch.
